Parameters: 
-- k-mer size (bp): 25
-- coverage threshold: 5
-- low coverage threshold: 2
-- size (bp) of the left and right extensions (radius): 100
-- window-size size (bp): 400
-- max coverage per region: 10000
-- step size (bp): 100
-- minimum mapping quality: 1
-- minimum coverage for exporting mutation: 5
-- minimum coverage ratio for sequencing errors: 0.01
-- minimum coverage ratio for exporting mutation: 0.05
-- max number of mismatches for near-perfect repeats: 3
-- limit number of sequence paths to: 1000000
-- output directory: /home/yiwang/data/Public/microexon/result/vcf
-- max number of parallel jobs: 0
-- bam file: /home/yiwang/data/Public/microexon/result/transcript.sorted.bam
-- bed file: /home/yiwang/data/Public/microexon/reference_database/bed.file
-- reference file: /home/yiwang/data/Public/microexon/transcript_O.fasta
-- sample: ALL
-- output format for variants: vcf
-- file of selected coordinates: null
-- output variants in target? no
-- keep log files? no
